title: Fork, n.d.
inscribed: On silver mount engraved: M. RENNER
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two long tines, attached to silver join with chiseled decoration. Pistol-shaped horn handle with engraved silver neck, ferrule and sides. Three diamond-shaped silver caps on front and back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, n.d..
n.d.. Horn, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-270-c.
